__TOC__


== Concept ==
The <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork|Lubuntu Artwork Team]]</nowiki>'s intention for this release is making the most beautiful, fast and useful environment for Lubuntu. We'll achieve this improving Box, upgrading the icons and controls to give a more evolved look'n'feel, while keeping the maximum compatibility with the <nowiki>[[Artwork|Ubuntu Artwork]]</nowiki> main branch.

<nowiki>[[ attachment:raring.png | <nowiki>[[File:raring_mini.png]]</nowiki></nowiki> ]]

== Theme ==
Not many changes over here, but small improvements and fixes. If you want to test the last (maybe experimental) version with latest artwork changes use this PPA: '''lubuntu-art/daily'''<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:lubuntu_ui.png]]</nowiki>

== Icons ==
The plan is REALLY finishing (LOL) the Box icon theme for this release (at least, the system ones). A slow and delicate work. If you want to make additional icons for your apps, matching the Box theme, you can follow the <nowiki>[[Guidelines|Box style guidelines]]</nowiki>.
